item.title: I need help with a command
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

lol for the looping gfx all i can say is find it in another server and learn how to do it
or be cheap and try this stillgfx(332, absY, absX)*99999999999999999999999999; (<-- might log you off/lagg, LoL)
for ::ownerglowoff make it do a diff gfx, which wil basically interrupt your ownerglow and turn it off
:\

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with a command
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

I’m trying to create an ownerglow since my friend has it on his server

my command looks like this

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“ownerglow”)&& playerRights >= 3){
{
stillgfx(332, absY, absX);
}
}

but I have on problem… I want it to continue and have an ::ownerglowoff

Read full topic
